radio_info.short: The TV and Radio Unit of Intercollege introduces students to the field of electronic media with state of the art facilities and equipment (alogue and
radio_info.rest:
digital).  The TV section of the Unit houses three S-VHS editing suites, one 3-machine Beta editing suite with special effects, one 2-machine Beta editing suite with variable speed, one production floor equipped with all supporting equipment for studio productions using three studio Beta Cams, one control room with a teleprompter, a character generator, two CCU’S and a talk-back system, one sound control room and one sound booth.  The radio section of the Unit is fully digitalized using the latest audio/radio software.  It houses one audio studio connected to an audio recording booth and a radio studio connected to a talk-room.  Students have the opportunity to check out cameras (7 S-VHS, 4 Beta Cams and 1 DV Cam) and audio equipment (mini discs, DAT recorders) to complete projects of the TV/Radio concentration studies.

In addition to the academic requirements, the Unit gives students the opportunity to get involved in professiol productions as it produces work for the business sector such as commercials, documentaries, instructiol videos, corporate videos and conference/semir coverage.

Visit www.tvrunit.com to learn more about the unit and to watch the latest sudent and professiol productions.

radios.title: Xит FM 91,4
radios.profile_slogan: The Music of your life for the time of your life!

radio_info.short: Hit FM 91,4 , broadcasting from state of the art studios in Limassol, brings to the south of Cyprus its first ever independent music service
radio_info.rest:
in the English language. We are a team of dedicated broadcast professionals with a mission to deliver a service of unrivalled excellence. 

To be a good broadcaster, you have firstly to be a good listener. We at 91.4 Coast FM listened carefully to voices in the community (both Cypriot & British) bemoaning the lack of choice on the FM waveband, when we designed the station. Up until now there has been an audible gap between British Armed Forces’ radio and indigenous Greek speaking stations. 91.4 Coast FM fills that gap… and does so with a purposeful dedication to listener and advertiser alike. We have invested heavily in state-of-the-art technology which will transmit CD quality music to your radio, at home and on the move. 

Cyprus's accession to the EU signifies the most significant social, economic and cultural changes in its modern history. Limassol is a fast growing, cosmopolitan city of 200,000 inhabitants. Last year, Cyprus welcomed almost 3 million tourists to her sun drenched bosom. Limassol attracted 27% of these visitors who, together, represent 21% of the island’s GDP. 

As citizens from other EU countries take up their right to live, work and play in whichever member state they choose - the English language will assume an increasingly greater significance, both socially and economically. Limassol in the 21st century is truly a multiethnic, multicultural community which for the first time will be able to find free expression through the airwaves of 91.4 Coast FM. 

Tune in to hear CD quality, chatter-free popular music for grownups and one or two daringly different treats. We are all very fortunate to be sharing this small piece of paradise and, whether you live in Cyprus or you are one of the many visitors to these enchanted shores, 91.4 Coast FM is proud to offer you the perfect soundtrack to the Mediterranean experience.

radio_contacts.short: Hit FM 91,4 , broadcasting from state of the art studios in Limassol, brings to the south of Cyprus its first ever independent music service

radio_contact.address: 91.4 Coast FMSuite 401, Themis TowerOlympion Street3035 - Limassol - Cyprus

radios.title: Bayrak Radyosu
radios.profile_slogan: BM GENEL SEKRETERİ BAN, TARAFLARCA MERAKLA BEKLENEN KIBRIS RAPORUNU HAZIRLAYARAK GÜVENLİK KONSEYİ'NE SUNDU.

radio_info.short: Bayrak Radio was established on the 25th of December 1963 to voice the cause of the Turkish Cypriot people following its exclusion by Greek Cypriots
radio_info.rest:
from the 1960 Partnership Cyprus Republic.Radio Bayrak, put together with a few homemade electrical equipment started transmitting within a limited radius of 2.5 km from a small garage in the back yard of a house.On the 24th of February 1964, Radio Bayrak’s transmission could be listened to from across the whole island.

Despite its limited means, Radio Bayrak continued to voice the Turkish Cypriot people’s struggle for existence in the face of the Greek Cypriot attacks which reached its most violent peak in 1974.4th of December 1977, BRTK (Bayrak Radio and Television) starts its first FM broadcasts.1st of July 1979, the corporation airs its first colour broadcast.6th of July 1979, a first powerful broadcast link is established between Lefkosa and Ankara.Today the BRTK Corporation has become a strong and proud institution which transmits on two television channels and 5 radio channels.


In addition to the Turkish language BRT 1 and the mainly English language BRT 2 Television channels, one can choose to listen to any of the 5 radio stations: Bayrak Radio, Bayrak FM, Baryak International, Bayrak Classic FM and Bayrak Turkish Music.BRT’s television and radio transmissions which can be watched and listened to on the internet serve to carry the voice and image of the Turkish Cypriot people to the rest of the world.

 

In addition to the internet, BRT 1 TV, Bayrak Radio and Bayrak International which can be watched and listened by Turkish Cypriot and foreign viewers living abroad through satellite is proud to be able to reach out to Turkey, the Middle East as well as Europe.

 

Undergoing complete renewal, radio studios air programs and music through computerized automation systems, bringing radio broadcasting at the corporation to 21st century standards.Bayrak Radio, Bayrak International and Bayrak FM is proud to provide 24 hour uninterrupted broadcasting services.

------
Shows: Radio Sports

radio_info.short: "Κι εμείς οι δύο ανεβαίνουμε... στην κορυφή". Αυτή είναι η πορεία του Sfera 96,8από το 2003 που άρχισε να εκπέμπει στην Κύπρο μέχρι και σήμερα.
radio_info.rest:
Από τις πρώτες κιόλας εκπομπές του σαν παγκύπριος μουσικός ραδιοσταθμός ο Sfera 96.8 έγινε ο αγαπημένος σταθμός της Κύπρου, παρουσιάζοντας υψηλά ποσοστά ακροαματικότητας με αυξανόμενη δυναμική, που τον κατέταξαν πολύ σύντομα στην κορυφή των πρώτων μουσικών ραδιοσταθμών της Κύπρου. 
Σήμερα με ένα προσεκτικά επιλεγμένο ρεπερτόριο που περιλαμβάνει την καλύτερη ελληνική mainstream μουσική, ο Sfera 96,8 προσεγγίζει ακροατές από όλες τις ηλικίες, κοινωνικές τάξεις και περιοχές της Κύπρου. 
Σε πλήρη δε ταύτιση με τον Sfera 102.2 και με ένα επιτελείο μουσικών παραγωγών από Ελλάδα και Κύπρο, αναγνωρισμένων και καταξιωμένων όχι μόνο στο χώρο του ραδιοφώνου αλλά και στο χώρο των ΜΜΕ γενικότερα και του καλλιτεχνικού στερεώματος, ο Sfera 96.8 υλοποιεί αυτό που υποσχέθηκε τον Οκτώβριο του 2009, όταν υιοθέτησε το μότο "Κι εμείς οι δύο ανεβαίνουμε": Να είναι ο σταθμός που μεταδίδει θετική ενέργεια και ανεβάζει τη διάθεση των χιλιάδων ακροατών του!

radio_contacts.short: "Κι εμείς οι δύο ανεβαίνουμε... στην κορυφή". Αυτή είναι η πορεία του Sfera 96,8από το 2003 που άρχισε να εκπέμπει στην Κύπρο μέχρι και σήμερα.
